channel.description: Recent content in deployment on Gerundium

item.title: 3.3 Deploy Kubernetes
item.description: State/Version: 20231126 3.3 Deploy Kubernetes Once the stage is prepared kubernetes can deployed. 3.3.1 Development cluster #toBeDone 3.3.2 Staging cluster Automated build of HA k3s Cluster with kube-vip and MetalLB 3.3.3 Production cluster K3s Homepage # Create the k8s cluster k3d cluster create --api-port 6550 -p "8081:80@loadbalancer" --agents 2
